Package org.svvrl.goal.core.draw

Class SquareNode

java.lang.Object
org.svvrl.goal.core.draw.Node
org.svvrl.goal.core.draw.SquareNode
public class SquareNode
extends Node
A SquareNode is a node displayed as a square.
Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    SquareNode​(java.awt.geom.Point2D center, double radius_factor)
    Constructor with the central point of this node and the radius multiplier.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    protected java.awt.Shape createAcceptingShape​(java.awt.geom.Point2D center)
    Creates the shape at a specified position to indicate that this node is an accepting state.
    protected java.awt.Shape createMainShape​(java.awt.geom.Point2D center)
    Creates the main shape to be displayed for this node at a specified position.
    java.awt.Point getCrossPoint​(double theta)
    Returns the cross point between the outline of this node and the line from the central point of this node with an angle theta (from the x-axis).
    Pair<java.awt.geom.Point2D,​java.awt.geom.Point2D> getCrossPoint​(Orientation orient)
    Returns a pair of points that correspond to the start point and the end point of the self-loop of this node.

  • Method Details

    • createAcceptingShape

      protected java.awt.Shape createAcceptingShape​(java.awt.geom.Point2D center)
      Description copied from class: Node
      Creates the shape at a specified position to indicate that this node is an accepting state. In this case, the constructed shape is displayed above the shaped constructed by #createMainShape(Point2D).
      Specified by:
      createAcceptingShape in class Node
      Parameters:
      center - the central point of the shape to be created
      Returns:
      the shape indicating that this node is an accepting state

    • createMainShape

      protected java.awt.Shape createMainShape​(java.awt.geom.Point2D center)
      Description copied from class: Node
      Creates the main shape to be displayed for this node at a specified position.
      Specified by:
      createMainShape in class Node
      Parameters:
      center - the central point of the shape to be created
      Returns:
      the shape to be displayed for this node

    • getCrossPoint

      public java.awt.Point getCrossPoint​(double theta)
      Description copied from class: Node
      Returns the cross point between the outline of this node and the line from the central point of this node with an angle theta (from the x-axis). The angle theta should be within the range from - 3.141592653589793 to 3.141592653589793.
      Specified by:
      getCrossPoint in class Node
      Parameters:
      theta - an angle between -3.141592653589793 and 3.141592653589793
      Returns:
      the cross point

    • getCrossPoint

      public Pair<java.awt.geom.Point2D,​java.awt.geom.Point2D> getCrossPoint​(Orientation orient)
      Description copied from class: Node
      Returns a pair of points that correspond to the start point and the end point of the self-loop of this node.
      Specified by:
      getCrossPoint in class Node
      Parameters:
      orient - the orientation of the self-loop
      Returns:
      a pair of points that correspond to the start point and the end point of the self-loop of this node
